channel.title: blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels and self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: Controlled Monetization
item.description: I took the pills. Like everyone else, I took the pills and I sent in the hair and the piss to prove I took the pills. I’d figured something out, though: I could stop taking the pills for the first half of the month, then double up at the end. I still passed the tests; no one knocked on the door.

item.title: From Spaceman to Plantsman
item.description: The first time the spaceman saw my garden, I thought he was going to strangle me.
